summary: A troubled husband and executive adopts a beaver hand-puppet as his sole means of communication.

Brown|Chiquita Camille|Barbara Ann Davison|Luca Foggiano|Orli Hersch|Ai Kiyono|Michelle E. Mancini|Sakura Sugihara|Maggie Wagner|Bill Walters
title: El castor
